p: Serum samples were collected randomly from eight provinces ( Table 1) from December 2016 to November 2017. The patients had fever and rash, but the sera were negative for measles and rubella IgM. We have studied the areas where active entomological surveillance of Ae. albopictus and Ae. aegypti was carried out in spring, summer and winter, 2008â€“2014 in those regions.
